3services:

12      - NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL=https://your-domain.com

14    restart: unless-stopped

16    # volumes:
17    #   - ./data:/app/data

19  # å¯é€‰ï¼šæ·»åŠ  Nginx åå‘ä»£ç†

26      - ./nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf

28      - nextjs-app
